message.name: ERR_MISSING_MANDATORY_SERVER_DIR
message.locale: The server directory ('serverDir' parameter) is mandatory and must be provided.

message.name: ERR_MISSING_MANDATORY_COMPONENT_NAME
message.locale: The destination component name ('component' parameter) is mandatory and must be provided.

message.name: ERR_NON_EXISTING_SERVER_DIR
message.locale: Server directory '%1s' must exist.

message.name: ERR_NON_EXISTING_COMPONENTS_DIR
message.locale: Directory 'components' must exist in the specified server directory '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_NON_EXISTING_DEST_COMPONENT_DIR
message.locale: The destination component '%1s' must exists in the 'components' directory.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_CREATE_DATAMANAGER_DIR
message.locale: The directory for datamanger files '%1s' cannot be created in '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_CREATE_DMX_DIR
message.locale: The directory for DMX files '%1s' cannot be created in '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_CREATE_CLOB_DIR
message.locale: The directory for CLOB files '%1s' cannot be created in '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_CREATE_BLOB_DIR
message.locale: The directory for BLOB files '%1s' cannot be created in '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_CREATE_TAB_DIR
message.locale: The directory for TAB configuration files '%1s' cannot be created in '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_CREATE_CTX_DIR
message.locale: The directory for codetable CTX files '%1s' cannot be created in '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_EXTRACTION_STRATEGY_NOT_DETERMINED
message.locale: Extraction strategy cannot be determined. Provide a list of evidence type logical names to extract or set the 'extractAll' parameter to true.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_KEY_RANGE
message.locale: Key range for generating replacement keys must be provided via the 'lowerKey' and 'upperKey' parameters.

message.name: ERR_INSUFFICIENT_KEY_RANGE
message.locale: Insufficient replacement key range (%1s - %2s).

message.name: ERR_INVALID_KEY_RANGE
message.locale: The lower key '%1s' must be less than the upper key '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_PRESERVE_KEY_RANGE
message.locale: The preserve range keys value '%1s' is invalid.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_KEY_NUMBER
message.locale: The key '%1s' is not a valid long number.

message.name: ERR_ONLY_ONE_KEY_RANGE_PARAMETER
message.locale: Both 'lowerKey' and 'upperKey' parameters must be specified.

message.name: INF_BEGIN_EXTRACTION_OF_ENTITY
message.locale: Extracting entity '%1s'.

message.name: INF_BEGIN_EXTRACTION_OF_CODETABLE
message.locale: Extracting codetable '%1s'.

message.name: INF_UNKNOWN_LOGICAL_NAME
message.locale: Dynamic Evidence Type with logical name '%1s' cannot be found.

message.name: INF_EXTRACTING_ALL_EVIDENCE_TYPES
message.locale: Extracting all Dynamic Evidence Types.

message.name: INF_EXTRACTING_LIST_OF_EVIDENCE_TYPES
message.locale: Extracting Dynamic Evidence Types: %1s.

message.name: INF_EXTRACTING_EVIDENCE_TYPES_WITH_CODE_PREFIX
message.locale: Extracting Dynamic Evidence Types with code prefix '%1s'.

message.name: INF_WRITING_DATAMANAGER_FILE
message.locale: Writing DATAMANAGER file: %1s.

message.name: INF_WRITING_CLOB_FILE
message.locale: Writing CLOB file: %1s.

message.name: INF_WRITING_BLOB_FILE
message.locale: Writing BLOB file: %1s.

message.name: INF_WRITING_CODETABLE_FILE
message.locale: Writing CODETABLE file: %1s.

message.name: INF_WRITING_SECTION_FILE
message.locale: Writing SECTION file: %1s.

message.name: INF_EMPTY_DMX_FILE
message.locale: DMX file '%1s' is empty and will not be written to the disk.

message.name: INF_EMPTY_CTX_FILE
message.locale: CTX file '%1s' is empty and will not be written to the disk.

message.name: INF_NO_EVIDENCE_TYPES_FOR_PREFFIX
message.locale: No active dynamic evidence types with code prefix '%1s' were found.

message.name: INF_NO_EVIDENCE_TYPES_FOR_LOGICAL_NAME_LIST
message.locale: No active dynamic evidence types were found for the specified logical names: %1s

message.name: INF_NO_EVIDENCE_TYPES_ON_SYSTEM
message.locale: No active dynamic evidence types were found on the system.

message.name: INF_REPLACING_KEYS_WITH_RANGE
message.locale: Replacing primary keys of extracted records with keys from the input range: %1s - %2s!

message.name: INF_NO_KEY_REPLACEMENT
message.locale: No primary key replacement of extracted database records!
